Reviews.Title: Everything worked out of the box...still need to finish installation however
Reviews.Author: Troglobyte
Reviews.Content: After frustrating experiences trying to find a quality security camera/dvr system.  I found a Security camera review website that recommended Honeywell products.The downside was that instead of 4 cameras, for the same money, I get one camera.  BUT everything worked out of the box.  Easy to read instructions and was able to quickly verify all features worked.  This is more than I can say for other systems I purchased.Would recommend this system to others that want a quality Camera/DVR but don't want to spend the $ of an IP camera system.T
